name: Morpion 80's Edition
description:
You have always dreamed of playing Tic Tac Toe with Friends but each time, the game is aesthetically disappointing...

Do not wait any longer, play Morpion 80's Edition wich will immerse you in world inspired by synthwave style..!

~ Simple Commands : 

  ->  Press Any Keys to Start 

  ->  Click on a box to play
